name: Free The Ocean
description:
You play as The Seahorse and have to traverse the seafloor to free other ocean dwellers from falsely discarded trash. It's a short but fun puzzle game. 

Use WASD to control the Seahorse. When you are adjacent to the sea creature you wish to free press Space Bar. You have a limited amount of moves to free all the sea creatures on the screen. Seaweed will use two moves, and Fish Highways will help you travel quicker to your target. 

I recommend playing in full screen

Made for https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2021
